channel.title: Windows_and_DOS on csmertx
channel.description: Recent content in Windows_and_DOS on csmertx

item.description: Windows & DOS VM requirements Windows 7 RAM: 1G to 4G VRAM: 32M to 1G Storage: 64G to 2T Windows XP RAM: 512M to 2048M VRAM: 32M to 128M Storage: 20G to 100G Windows 98 RAM: 16M to 512M (or 480M) VRAM: 8M to 32M Storage: 200M to 4G Windows 95 RAM: 4M to 512M (or 480M) VRAM: 8M to 16M Storage: 100M to 2G Windows 3.
